name: Five Nights at Nikocado Avocado's
description:
lore: handunit from hit game five nights at freddy's sister location kidnaps you and forces you to break into nikocado avocado's house to spy on him for 6 hours five nights in a row

HOW 2 GAME:

-watch the big bad boys from the cameras

-use the door button on the cameras to stop nikokado belly flopping on you (cam 8)

-feed grimace because if his grimace meter gets too low he will get angry

-shoot fredy fabear with the  gun  when his eyes light up to stop him from getting the victory royale (in the left area of the office)

-DON'T shoot fredy fabear if his eyes aren't lit up!!! if you shoot him when he isn't active he won't believe you telling him it was a misinput and he will kick you from the party (you don't want that to happen)

-if the ourple guy appears on the cameras type the three numbers that appear to make him go away-don't die
